meanings.definition: Kick (a football) from a stationary position on the ground, as in football or rugby.
meanings.sent1: He enjoys placekicking during football practice.
meanings.sent2: The player will placekick the ball for the extra point.
meanings.sent3: The coach joked that his placekicking skills were better than his passing.
meanings.sent4: Her precision in placekicking was like a skilled archer hitting the bullseye.
meanings.sent5: Practice your placekicking technique to improve your accuracy.

meanings.definition: The act of kicking a football from a stationary position on the ground.
meanings.sent1: His placekicking is crucial for the team's success.
meanings.sent2: The crowd cheered after a successful placekicking attempt.
meanings.sent3: The mascot's costume featured a giant placekicking foot.
meanings.sent4: In the championship game, her placekicking was the highlight of the match.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the placekicking echoed through the stadium.
